procurement_method:
full_summary:
# MINI PORTABLE HOT WATER SYSTEM [MINI SYSTÈME PORTATIF DE DISTRUTION D’EAU CHAUDE]

### Background
The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking a supplier to provide mini portable hot water systems for military use. The requirement is for the delivery of two quantities of the system: 3 units to be delivered to Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Shearwater in Nova Scotia, and 9 units to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt in British Columbia.

### Solicitation Details

* Solicitation Number: W8482-231452/A
* Publication Date: April 17, 2023
* Tender Closing Date and Time: May 10, 2023, at 2:00 PM (Eastern Time)
* Expected Contract Start Date: May 25, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: June 28, 2023

### Requirements
The DND is seeking a supplier who can provide the mini portable hot water systems, which must meet the following specifications:

* GSIN: N4410
* NSN: 01-7082948
* Part Number: AAI-MP800-110-A
* NCAGE: 9V562
* Brand Name and Model: Aqua Air Industries

The requirements also include a preference for Canadian goods and/or services. Bidders must submit prices in Canadian dollars. Bids submitted in foreign currency will be rejected.

### Contact Information
For further information, please contact Neil Trousdale at:

* Email: [neil.trousdale@forces.gc.ca](mailto:neil.trousdale@forces.gc.ca)
* Phone: (819) 939-9208

### Tenders
Tenders must be submitted through the Canadian Trade Diversification Forum's electronic tendering system. Documents may be submitted in either English or French.

### Attachments
The following documents are available for download:

* English Tender Notice (PDF)
* English RFP Clauses (PDF)
* French Tender Notice (PDF)
* French RFP Clauses (PDF)

Note that the rewritten entry has the same information as the original, but in a more concise and professional format. The key details have been highlighted and easy to read. I made sure to include all the necessary details, but did not include unnecessary information. Let me know if you'd like me to make any adjustments.
